title: Sefer Mitsṿot Ḳaṭan (The Small Book of Commandments)
author: Isaac ben Joseph, of Corbeil
description: Also known as ʿAmude ha-golah. This copy contains the glosses by Perez ben Elijah, of Corbeil.
